Authorization.AdminsOnly: This space is reserved for administrators
Authorization.ContactAdminsForRegistration: The {{ authMethod }} {{ authString }} was not found in our registry. Please try a different authentication method or get in touch at {{ organizationEmail }}
Authorization.TryAgain: Log out and try again with a different user
Authorization.RecoverEmailPassword: Get instructions sent to this email that explain how to reset your password.
Authorization.CheckPasswordRecoverEmail: Follow the instructions sent to {{ email }} to recover your password.
Authorization.CheckSignInEmail: Follow the link sent to {{ email }} to complete the authentication.
Authorization.ConfirmSignInEmail: Please confirm the email used to sign in.
Authorization.DifferentSignInEmail: The email you used to log in isn't the email expected by the app. Please confirm the email used to receive the sign in link.
Authorization.ResendEmailLink: The sign in link was already used or has expired. Would you like to resend the email link.
Authorization.EnterSMSCode: Please enter the code sent to {{ phone }}
Authorization.ResendSMS: Click to try and resend code to {{ phone }}. If the problem persists, contact the organization admin
Authorization.SMSDataRatesMayApply: By tapping Verify, an SMS may be sent. Message & data rates may apply.

AuthError.EmailNotFound: That email address doesn't match an existing account
AuthError.InvalidPassword: The email and password you entered don't match
AuthError.InvalidVerificationCode: The code you've entered is invalid, please enter the correct code
AuthError.InvalidEmail: Wrong email. Please enter the email you used to receive the sign in link.

AuthTitle.SignInWithEmail: Sign in with email and password

CustomerLabel.FillTheForm: Please fill out some details before we continue
CustomerLabel.Name: Name
CustomerLabel.InputRegistrationCode: Input your registration code here. If you don't have the registration code, contact your organization admin
CustomerLabel.AdminValuesDescription: These are administrative values for a customer. They are not visible to the customer

Validations.RequiredEntry: At least one value is required
Validations.InvalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone format: phone number prepended with '+' sign and country code (i.e. +385 99 2222 555)
Validations.TimeMismatch: Start time is greater than end time
Validations.WeakPassword: Password should contain at least {{ min }} characters
Validations.InvalidInterval: Please provide a valid interval value, e.g. 09:00 - 11:00
Validations.InvalidSmsFrom: Invalid format: Only letters are allowed

Prompt.DeleteSlotDisabled: Unable to delete the slot, as it has already been booked by one or more athletes

Prompt.ConfirmSMS: Are you sure you want to send an SMS to: {{ phone }}?
Prompt.NoPhoneMessage: No phone number has been store for this customer, please update the phone number in customer's record.

Prompt.ConfirmFinalizeBookings: Are you sure you wish to finalize bookings {{ month, MMMM }}. You won't be able to make any changes for the given month.
Prompt.EnterEmailMessage: Your calendar will be sent to this email address
